body.name: BREVI Toothbrush, BREVI Brush, BREVI Nordic-Inspired Premium Nano Toothbrush, Extra Soft Toothbrush with 20000 Soft Bristles, Ultra-fine Soft Toothbrush for Sensitive Gums and Teeth (Black+white)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Unique Million Nano Bristle Design】BREVI toothbrush, using nano technology, Ultra Soft Toothbrush bristles are only at 80μm, much thinner than other soft bristles which thicknesses at 120μm, and keeps the bristles hygienic for the lifetime of the brush head.

【Deep Cleanse】Extra soft toothbrush with more than 20,000 pretty soft micro-nano bristles,the slender brush is soft and flexible, allowing it to penetrate the teeth and sulcus to remove tartar and clean the teeth without damaging the tooth enamel. High-density uniform Soft rubber teeth Wear-resistant and durable Tongue-cleaning With comprehensive cleaning function.

【Lighweight and Ergonomic Design】The toothbrush has been ergonomically designed and tested thousands of times. The brush head is fine-tuned according to the comfort of the person. The wavy toothbrush design is more suitable for teeth and has no sanitary corners. Comfortable light ABS handle design can better adapt to the fingers, prevent excessive force and damage the gums, and gently care for the gums.

【Applicable People】Our ultra-soft toothbrushes are designed for sensitive teeth. Older people, pregnant women and children (especially those who like soft hair) can use it to take care of their teeth. Its minimalist design is ideal for men and women, boys and girls.

【Perfect for Traveling】Super Soft Toothbrush great for traveling, Outdoor survival, camping, Hotels, Guests.Portable design fits comfortably in toiletry bags, luggage, backpacks, purses, carry-on bags and fits just about anywhere. It is light in weight and incredibly easy to use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose our BreviBrush Toothbrush? Our super soft hair is 80 times of ordinary toothbrush hair. It combines the advantages of fine, dense and soft. Each hair is only 80 microns in diameter, which can be stimulated 0 times and gently massaged.Nano Toothbrush have 2,0000 ultra-fine bristles, you can deeply clean your teeth, every corner.Unique waved-pattern design with soft and flexible bristles, which can penetrate the teeth and the sulcus to remove tartar and clean the teeth without damaging the surface protection layer.

BREVI toothbrush for the whole family Micron soft hair, more effective and gentle care for gum health.Nano Toothbrush is suitable for people with bleeding gums and sensitive gums.Prevent tooth decay, improve gum health and fresher breath, and teeth whitening.

Each toothbrush is equipped with a special storage box, easy to carry travel outdoor survival camping easy to use. BREVI Nordic Nano Toothbrush Ultra-fine Soft Adult Tooth Brush Teeth Deep Cleaning Portable Travel Dental Oral Care Brush Product material: soft fiber hair + ABS high light handle.Product weight: 25.5gColor: black, white, green, pinkPackage Included:2/4Packs BREVI Toothbrush Notes: Due to the difference between different monitors, the pictures may not reflect the actual color of the item.Compare the detail sizes with yours, please allow 1-3cm error, due to manual measurement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as good as Brevi!
reviews.reviewText: First tried the Brevi brand, but these type of toothbrushes should be replaced every month or so, so to order $20 a month for toothbrushes from Brevi was outrageous, I had to looked for an alternative. This is the exact same toothbrush, no difference! My husband and I LOVE these brushes and won’t ever go back to a traditional one. They clean well, get into the nooks and crannies of the mouth and my gums have never looked more pink or healthier! 4 for $6 is a steal too. You will absolutely love how well these clean and how gentle they are on your gums and enamel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent toothbrush that's unbelievably comfortable to use.
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is amazing. It cleans super well while feeling luxuriously soft. The case it comes in is well made and ventilated. I'm so glad I have this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft yet still stiff enough to get a deep clean. Well worth the money. If it's not for you, then toss it at 3 months when you have to buy another tooth brush anyway. Remember to change brushes every couple of month for good hygiene. Performs great considering its plush appearance. A1 performance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite toothbrushes
reviews.reviewText: For over a decade I’ve been using a different brand of toothbrush and decided to try these out after seeing an ad for them and I really like them. The bristles are softer than what most people are used to but they clean the gums and teeth really well. I’m not sure why some reviewers said their teeth didn’t feel clean after using these toothbrushes, maybe it’s their toothpaste that’s not working well enough. But if you brush long enough in little circular motions with a good toothpaste, your teeth should feel clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just got them. We shall see how long they last !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars False advertising, horrible toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: They claim it’s good for gums. Oh really!!! The design makes it practically impossible to clean your gums. I mean sure they sponge your teeth….not sure if the extra dense not flexible toothbrush even cleans your teeth, but it definitely does not clean around the gum line very well. In fact, the gum line area of my teeth was practically untouched. The design is horrible I could go on, nothing they say about this product is true except it’s ultra dense bristles which actually make it harder to clean your teeth. I want my money back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Weird but amazing texture
reviews.reviewText: It was so strange using it the first few times but it is so soft and gentle but i feel like it cleans my teeth better than any toothbrush I have had before. I really love it. My husband and I only use these now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This toothbrush is great
